logFilesParallelDegree.description: Number of parallel API calls to download database logfiles.

logFilesCheckRegExp.description: The RegExp wich will be used to analyze the database log files. Case insensitive.

metricsCorrelationThreshold.description: How much metrics should correlate in correlated metrics section. Default is 0.7 or 70%.

tempPriceFileRetentionDays.description: The retention period in days of the pricelist file. If file is older than this number of days, it will be downloaded again.

inferenceParallelDegree.description: Number of parallel Bedrock inference calls to execute.

bedrockRegion.description: The AWS region for Amazon Bedrock to use.

claudeMode.description: The claude model to use for analyzes.

anthropicVersion.description: The version of Anthropic to use in Bedrock API call.
